solution.text:
\(\frac{_{{3*j}}_x^3 – _{{8*j}}_x^2 – _{{18*j}}_x + _{j}_c}{x +1}
Using the long division method gives us:
Quotient = \(_{{3*j}}_x^2 - _{{11*j}}_x – _{{7*j}}_\) and Remainder = \(c+_{{7*j}}_\)
Since we know that the divisor is a factor of the dividend, the remainder must be 0. Therefore \(c = -_{{7*j}}_\)
